swal.title: New in permacast V3 ‚ú®
swal.html:
• iTunes/Spotify compatible RSS imports via the upcoming permacast CLI
  • Gas cost reduction
  • Auto-protection from duplicated uploads
  • Read full changelog

swal.title: Install ArConnect to continue
swal.text: Permacast uses ArConnect to make it easier to authenticate and send transactions for questions and answers

home.subtext: Let's see what we have for today

queue.emptyqueue: Your queue is empty, add some episodes to it!

uploadshow.title: New Show
uploadshow.label: Short URL
uploadshow.label-explanation: This is an optional parameter, but if you choose to use it, a short url will be created
uploadshow.name: Podcast name
uploadshow.author: Author
uploadshow.feeexplanation: We charge a flat fee to prevent spam

validation.name: Podcast name must be between {{minLength}} and {{maxLength}} characters.
validation.description: Description must be between {{minLength}} and {{maxLength}} characters
validation.author: Author must be between {{minLength}} and {{maxLength}} characters

label.limit: Label Length must be between 1 and 35 characters.

showadded.title: Show added
showadded.text: Show added permanently to Arweave. Check in a few minutes after the transaction has mined.

uploadfailed.title: Unable to add show
uploadfailed.text: Check your wallet balance and network connection

reset.text: Podcast cover image is not squared (1:1 aspect ratio)!

uploading.title: Uploading, please wait a few seconds...

uploadcomplete.title: Upload complete
uploadcomplete.text: Episode uploaded permanently to Arweave. Check in a few minutes after the transaction has mined.

uploadfailed.title: Upload failed
uploadfailed.text: Check your AR balance and network connection

verified.explanation: This user is a verified recipient on ANS

unverified.explanation: This user does not exist on ANS. Always double check who you send money to.

nopodcasts: No podcasts here yet. Upload one!
